projects: [{"title":"Improving KYC/Onboarding on Mobile and Web","start_date":"Mar 2015","description":"As a team, we improved on-boarding conversions by over 300% by revamping the merchant KYC document-upload process into a simple, intuitive, mobile-friendly and camera-aware workflow. Optimised front-end and used Base64 encode/decode to deliver superfast upload performance even on 2G connections."},{},{},{}]
